Package boofcv.alg.feature.describe

Class Summary
DescribePointBrief<T extends ImageSingleBand> BRIEF: Binary Robust Independent Elementary Features.
DescribePointBriefSO<T extends ImageSingleBand> Extension of DescribePointBrief which adds invariance to orientation and scale.
DescribePointGaussian12<T extends ImageSingleBand,K extends Kernel2D> Uses steerable Gaussian derivatives to describe an image feature.
DescribePointPixelRegion<T extends ImageSingleBand,D extends TupleDesc> Describes a rectangular region using its raw pixel intensities.
DescribePointPixelRegionNCC<T extends ImageSingleBand> Describes a rectangular region using its raw pixel intensities which have been normalized for intensity.
DescribePointRectangleRegion<T extends ImageSingleBand> Base class for describing a rectangular region using pixels.
DescribePointSteerable2D<T extends ImageSingleBand,K extends Kernel2D> Extracts a set of image features using a steerable kernel.
DescribePointSurf<II extends ImageSingleBand> Implementation of the SURF feature descriptor, see [1].
DescribePointSurfMod<II extends ImageSingleBand> Modified SURF descriptor which attempts to smooth out edge conditions.
SurfDescribeOps Operations related to computing SURF descriptors.
